{{Wireless embedded system |brand=pakedge |model=WR-1 |revision=0.20 LFP v1.00 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |price=300 |fcc_date=09/07/2017 |fcc_id=SLYWR1X22 |ic_id=12633A-WR1X22 |pcb_id=7016A1374004 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4018;Q, IPQ4018, 0VV, NE649WJE, E064900; |cpu1_cspeed=717 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL256SAIFR0 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J5 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4018;Q, IPQ4018, 0VV, NE649WJE, E064900; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4018;Q, IPQ4018, 0VV, NE649WJE, E064900; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075;Q, QCA8075, 0VV, PK649Q6F, K064901; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz WLAN/BT FEM;Skyworks;SKY85303-11;SKY11, 85303, 617FP;2;,,, 5GHz Front End Module;Qorvo;RFFM4558;4558, B0ZX;2; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|802.11ac Dual Band Wireless Router}} :[https://www.pakedge.com/products/routers/ Product page] "WR-1-0.20 LFP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :OEM: [[Senao]] (PCB ID: 7016A1374004) The user manual on the FCC suggests that the default username/password :is pakedge/pakedger but the label sample says ''admin/admin''. ===Links=== *[http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20170907005259/en/Control4-Announces-Pakedge-Wireless-Router-BakPak-Lite ''Control4 Announces Pakedge Wireless Router with BakPak Lite
at CEDIA 2017'' on '''BusinessWire'''] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Qualcomm]]'' IPQ4018 @717MHz :Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A7) *Storage: 32MB (SPI NOR) Flash *Memory: 256MB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: 802.11abgn/ac (2.4/5GHz) *Network: 5x GbE ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V/1.5A via barrel ===See also=== :;[https://www.pakedge.com/products/wireless/ Products • Wireless] • [https://www.pakedge.com/products/routers/ Routers] *[[Pakedge K60D]] *[[Pakedge R10]] *[[Pakedge RK-1]] *[[Pakedge RE-2]] *[[Pakedge WA-2200-1]] *[[Pakedge WAP-W2]] *[[Pakedge WR-1]] *[[Pakedge WK-1]] (O/C) *[[Pakedge WK-2]] (C) *[[Pakedge WX-1]] (O/C) ==Images== File:Pakedge WR-1 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Pakedge WR-1 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__ {{lowercase}}
